column4: when i double click my windowsXP computer icon in Network, (Places..> Network), ubuntu dont show the shared folders and i can open the windows shared folder directly like this ( smb://computer name/shared folder) and then press enter, ubuntu asks me password and letme IN
make sure your ubuntu box is in the same workgroup
it is in the same workgroup " HOME"
the workgroup is same, its " HOME" on both computers
